title: Hot turkey and Stilton bagels
ingredients: ['4 bagels, plain or onion-flavoured', '30 g (1 oz) butter', '2 tbsp cranberry jelly', '225 g (8 oz) cold roast turkey meat, skin removed, then thinly sliced', '100 g (3 1/2 oz) Stilton cheese', 'To serve', '2 oranges, cut into wedges', 'salad leaves']
